full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHES RGYAL BA SRAS BCAS LA PHUL BA'I SPRINGS YIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007B ZHES BYANG PHYOGS KYI SA MTHAR SKYES BA'I BAN CHUNG MKHAS GRUB ZER BAS SKYE 'GRO'I SPYOD TSUL DANG, BSTAN PA'I GNAS TSUL GYI NYAMS DANG SBYAR TE BRIS PA DANG NYID BYA ROG DKAR POR SGRUB STE 'DZAM BU GLING PA RNAMS DANG 'GRAS 'DOD PA MIN GYI, ,SKAL MNYAM 'GA' ZHIG LA'ANG PHAN PA'I SKABS SRID DAM SNYAM PA YIN PAS, KHYED 'GA' ZHIG GI THUGS LA PHOG TSE BZOD PA'I PHAN YON DRAN PAR ZHU ZHU, 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG ,
